text: Uye (yeukai) pazvakanzi kwavari: “Garai muguta rino (reJerusarema) uye mova munodya mariri kwese kwamunoda, uye mova munoti: ‘(Imi Allah!) Tiregererei zvitadzo zvedu’, uye mova munopinda mumikova makapfugama. Tichakuregererai zvitadzo zvenyu. Tichava tinowedzera (mubairo) kune avo vanoita mabasa akanaka.”
